hooks.command: bash -c 'tee >(echo "$(date +%H:%M:%S) Notification: $(cat)" >> ~/.claude/hook-debug.log) | jq -r "if .cwd then (.cwd | split(\"/\") | last) else (.transcript_path | split(\"/\") | .[-2] | split(\"-\") | .[-2:] | join(\"-\")) end" | xargs -I {} osascript -e "display notification \"승인이 필요합니다\" with title \"Claude Code [{}]\" sound name \"Basso\""'

bash -c 'tee >(echo "$(date +%H:%M:%S) Stop: $(cat)" >> ~/.claude/hook-debug.log) | jq -r "if .cwd then (.cwd | split(\"/\") | last) else (.transcript_path | split(\"/\") | .[-2] | split(\"-\") | .[-2:] | join(\"-\")) end" | xargs -I {} osascript -e "display notification \"작업이 완료되었습니다\" with title \"Claude Code [{}]\" sound name \"Ping\""'

bash -c 'tee >(echo "$(date +%H:%M:%S) SubagentStop: $(cat)" >> ~/.claude/hook-debug.log) | jq -r "[(if .subagent_type then .subagent_type else \"unknown\" end), (if .cwd then (.cwd | split(\"/\") | last) else (.transcript_path | split(\"/\") | .[-2] | split(\"-\") | .[-2:] | join(\"-\")) end)] | @tsv" | while IFS=$\'\t\' read agent proj; do osascript -e "display notification \"${agent} 에이전트 작업 완료\" with title \"Claude Code [$proj]\" sound name \"Tink\""; done'

bash -c 'tee >(echo "$(date +%H:%M:%S) SessionStart: $(cat)" >> ~/.claude/hook-debug.log) | jq -r "if .cwd then (.cwd | split(\"/\") | last) else (.transcript_path | split(\"/\") | .[-2] | split(\"-\") | .[-2:] | join(\"-\")) end" | xargs -I {} osascript -e "display notification \"세션이 시작되었습니다\" with title \"Claude Code [{}]\" sound name \"Blow\""'

bash -c 'tee >(echo "$(date +%H:%M:%S) SessionEnd: $(cat)" >> ~/.claude/hook-debug.log) | jq -r "if .cwd then (.cwd | split(\"/\") | last) else (.transcript_path | split(\"/\") | .[-2] | split(\"-\") | .[-2:] | join(\"-\")) end" | xargs -I {} osascript -e "display notification \"세션이 종료되었습니다\" with title \"Claude Code [{}]\" sound name \"Submarine\""'
